book.synopsis: The eagerly awaited paperback of the BusinessWeek bestseller that has sold 100,000+ copies and been translated into 20 languages. With combined sales of more than 14 million copies, the books of Ken Blanchard are a phenomenal source of business wisdom. In this international bestseller - Blanchard
s signature style - concise, inspiring, emotionally gripping, and always down to earth - Mission Possible reveals how to make any organizational change program a success.
